entry.title: Quote of the Day - Great Things
entry.content:
To achieve great things, two things are needed, a plan and not quite
enough time.

Hat tip: Capitalists @ Work.

entry.title: Quote of the Day
entry.content:
Q: What’s the difference between Ant and Maven?

A: The creator of Ant has apologised.

James Duncan Davidson journal.duncandavidson.com/post/…

entry.title: Vote Now!
entry.content: Fed up with all of the pre-election coverage in the (UK) media right now? Instead of listening to call-me-Dave drone on and on, or hearing how the one-eyed Gobblin’ King has once again saved the world, go cast your vote for Computer Engineer Barbie!

entry.title: The C Programming Language
entry.content:
C functions may be used recursively; that is, a function may call itself either directly or indirectly. Uninquiring souls may take this as just another peculiarity of those C folk, of whose ways their neighbours speak little to outsiders but much among themselves.

By Kernighan, Ritchie, and Lovecraft

entry.title: Best. Method. Name. Ever
entry.content:
In the iPhone SDK (with camel case broken out into separate words):

attention class dump user yes its us again although swizzling and overriding private methods is fun it wasnt much fun when your app stopped working please refrain from doing so in the future okay thanks bye

Via Erica Sadun.
